name: KillerHouse
description:
Start, Step 1: find 5 key (red & blue & Black & green And Yallow Keys)

Step 2: Run (Killer in this House, Run) 

Step 3 : Find the Exit Door (& Run) 

Scenes in the game:

1 : MainMenu(you can take quality(low, medium, high) and Audio Setting). 

2 : GameLevel (5 Keys and 5 Door's) 

(you can Click in escape key (open main menu in level). 

3 : LoseGame(you can Change quality and Audio and restart game and go to mainmenu and quit game).
